Class CustomerScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication.controller.CustomerScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that views customers in the application.
